                                        alongside vibrant Gypsophila flowers. Each crop is grown with a sustainability-
                                        first mindset, harvested at peak freshness, and handled through a disciplined
                                        cold chain.
                                    </p>

                                        produce delivered reliably to multiple global markets.

        <section class="flat-spacing-1">
            <div class="tf-container">
                <div class="row">

                        <div class="wrap-sidebar-account">

            <section class="s-other-commitment">
                <div class="tf-container">
                    <div class="row wrap-reverse">
                        <div class="col-lg-6">
                            <div class="content">
                                <div class="img-item item-5 relative">
                                    <img class="tf-animate-1" src="images/item/rice-plant-2.png" alt="">
                                </div>
                                <h2 class="title fw-7 fs-45 font-worksans text-anime-style-1">
                                    Other Commitments
                                </h2>
                                <div class="other-list">
                                    <ul>
                                        <li>
                                            <div class="icon"><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-check"></i></div>
                                            <p>Plan the farms crop rotation and variety choice to minimise use of
                                                fertilisers,
                                                pesticides, herbicides and fungicides.</p>
                                        </li>
                                        <li>
                                            <div class="icon"><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-check"></i></div>
                                            <p>Umbilical slurry injection cuts our fertiliser down tenfold.
                                            </p>
                                        </li>
                                        <li>
                                            <div class="icon"><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-check"></i></div>
                                            <p>Maintain and enhance the structure of our soil through sustainable crop
                                                rotations and well managed operations.
                                            </p>
                                        </li>
                                        <li>
                                            <div class="icon"><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-check"></i></div>
                                            <p>Thoroughly research the source of our products, buying from nurseries and
                                                manufacturers who adhere to high quality and environmental standards.
                                            </p>
                                        </li>
                                        <li>
                                            <div class="icon"><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-check"></i></div>
                                            <p>Continually make sure our products come from sustainable sources, such as
                                                FSC
                                                certified woods and Fairtrade coffee in our cafes.</p>
                                        </li>
                                        <li>
                                            <div class="icon"><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-check"></i></div>
                                            <p>Recommend alternatives to chemical options where possible.</p>
                                        </li>
                                    </ul>
                                </div>
                            </div>

                                            My vacations were always in nature-oriented places though. I became fond of
                                            the peace and quiet and fresh air that was available 24/7. These projects by
                                            Urban farmers really helped me get back those vacations within a few kms of
                                            the city.
                                        </p>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="testimonial item hidden ">
                                    <div class="author-wrap">
                                        <div class="left">
                                            <div class="image-avt">
                                                <img src="images/section/customer-say-3.jpg" alt="">
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="infor">
                                                <div class="name-wrap">
                                                    <a href="#" class="name text-upper hover-text-4">
                                                        Birthday Party
                                                    </a>
                                                    <div class="wg-rating">
                                                        <i class="fa-solid fa-star"></i>
                                                        <i class="fa-solid fa-star"></i>
                                                        <i class="fa-solid fa-star"></i>
                                                        <i class="fa-solid fa-star"></i>
                                                        <i class="fa-solid fa-star"></i>
                                                    </div>
                                                </div>
                                                <p class="duty">
                                                    Director, Radical Orange Pty Ltd.
                                                </p>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="right">
                                            <i class="icon-quote"></i>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="comment">
                                        <p class="caption fs-30 font-snowfall">
                                            I also wanted to let you know we had the most
                                            amazing time!
                                        </p>
                                        <p class="text">
                                            The farm and staff are phenomenal. Amanda and Sandra were so kind and caring
                                            and
                                            helped
                                            us to have the perfect first
                                            birthday despite the weather.
                                        </p>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-lg-12">
                            <div class="flex justify-center">

                                </a>
                            </div>
